member.name: T:LoggerLib.TextLogger
member.summary: Utility for logging events from a program to a text file.

member.name: M:LoggerLib.TextLogger.AddEntry(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the provided entry to the Entries list

member.name: M:LoggerLib.TextLogger.WriteEntriesToFile
member.summary: Writes the list of entries to a text file at path
